cast.overview: In the menacing inferno of the old North-American West, Liz is a genuine survivor who is hunted by a vengeful preacher for a crime she didn’t commit.
cast.title: Brimstone

cast.original_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
cast.overview: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.
cast.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

cast.overview: Singer Freddie Mercury, guitarist Brian May, drummer Roger Taylor and bass guitarist John Deacon take the music world by storm when they form the rock 'n' roll band Queen in 1970. Hit songs become instant classics. When Mercury's increasingly wild lifestyle starts to spiral out of control, Queen soon faces its greatest challenge yet – finding a way to keep the band together amid the success and excess.
cast.title: Bohemian Rhapsody

details.biography: Born in 1984, Jack Ernest Roth is the son of celebrated actor Tim Roth and award-winning writer and producer Lori Baker. Jack is best known for his roles as Big Issue Frank in Sky One's The Cafe (2011) Max in Sky Living's second series of 'Bedlam'(2012), Dolge Orlick in the BBC's 'Great Expectations'(2011) and as Charlie Wilson in The Great Train Robbery (2013). More recently, Roth has appeared on film in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, The Snowman, Us and Them and Brimstone, and on TV  in Detectorists, The Interceptor and Silent Witness.
details.name: Jack Roth
